Products About Sign In Register
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Location } from '@angular/common'; import { AuthService } from '../../core/auth.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.css'] }) export class HeaderComponent { constructor(private authService: AuthService, private location: Location) { } isLoggedIn(): boolean { return this.authService.isLoggedIn(); } logout(): void { this.authService.logout(); } goBack(): void { this.location.back(); // Navigates to the previous page } }
